title: Microsoft fixes flaw after being called irresponsible by Tenable CEO
description: Microsoft fixed a security flaw in the Power Platform Custom Connectors feature that let unauthenticated attackers access cross-tenant applications and Azure customers' sensitive data after being called "grossly irresponsible" by Tenable's CEO. [...]

title: New PaperCut critical bug exposes unpatched servers to RCE attacks
description: PaperCut recently fixed a critical security vulnerability in its NG/MF print management software that allows unauthenticated attackers to gain remote code execution on unpatched Windows servers. [...]

title: FBI warns of scammers posing as NFT devs to steal your crypto
description: The FBI warned today of fraudsters posing as Non-Fungible Token (NFT) developers to prey upon NFT enthusiasts and steal their cryptocurrency and NFT assets. [...]

title: Microsoft kills Cortana in Windows 11 preview, long live AI!
description: Microsoft has officially begun killing off Cortana as the company moves its focus towards integrating ChatGPT and AI into Windows 11. [...]

title: Google explains how Android malware slips onto Google Play Store
description: The Google Cloud security team acknowledged a common tactic known as versioning used by malicious actors to slip malware on Android devices after evading the Google Play Store's review process and security controls. [...]

title: Extended warranty robocallers fined $300 million after 5 billion scam calls
description: The Federal Communications Commission (FCC) has announced a record-breaking $299,997,000 fine imposed on an international network of companies for placing five billion robocalls to more than 500 million phone numbers over three months in 2021. [...]

title: Spotify down: music searches, pages, account signups not working
description: Spotify users are reporting the music streaming service to be down in the last hour. Spotify team is currently investigating the cause. [...]

title: Fake VMware vConnector package on PyPI targets IT pros
description: A malicious package that mimics the VMware vSphere connector module 'vConnector' was uploaded on the Python Package Index (PyPI) under the name 'VMConnect,' targeting IT professionals. [...]
